text: |} The Silken Glider Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Ireland open to two-year-old thoroughbred fillies. It is run at the Curragh over a distance of 1 mile (1,609 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in September. The race was first run in 2001. It was run at Leopardstown until 2002. Since 2007 it has been sponsored and run as the Staffordstown Stud Stakes. ==Winners== {| class = "sortable" | border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#77dd77" align="center" ! style="width:36px" | Year ! style="width:160px" | Winner ! style="width:180px" | Jockey ! style="width:180px" | Trainer ! style="width:60px" | Time |- | 2001 | Marionnaud | Kevin Manning | Jim Bolger | 1:45.10 |- | 2002 | Miss Helga | Seamie Heffernan | Aidan O'Brien | 0.00 |- | 2003 | Alexander Goldrun | Kevin Manning | Jim Bolger | 1:45.20 |- | 2004 | Allexina | Fran Berry | John Oxx | 1:48.50 |- | 2005 | Jioconda | Johnny Murtagh | Edward Lynam | 1:46.00 |- | 2006 | Boca Dancer | Declan McDonogh | Kevin Prendergast | 1:45.80 |- | 2007 | Savethisdanceforme | Seamie Heffernan | Aidan O'Brien | 1:44.37 |- | 2009 | Lady Lupus | Johnny Murtagh | Aidan O'Brien | 1:47.18 |- | 2010 | Gemstone | Johnny Murtagh | Aidan O'Brien | 1:46.48 |- | 2011 | Homecoming Queen | Joseph O'Brien | Aidan O'Brien | 1:41.60 |- | 2012 | Seolan | Chris Hayes | Paddy Prendergast Jr. | 1:51.74 |- | 2013 | Flying Jib | Pat Smullen | Dermot Weld | 1:40.08 |- | 2014 | Together Forever | Joseph O'Brien | Aidan O'Brien | 1:42.91 |- | 2015 | Best In The World | Ryan Moore | Aidan O'Brien | 1:43.88 |- | 2016 | Calare | James Doyle | Charlie Appleby | 1:44.95 |- | 2017 | Bye Bye Baby | Donnacha O'Brien | Aidan O'Brien | 1:53.01 |- | 2018 | Peach Tree | Donnacha O'Brien | Aidan O'Brien | 1:44.65 |- | 2019 | Fancy Blue | Seamie Heffernan | Aidan O'Brien | 1:53.09 |- | 2020 | Fantasy Lady | Billy Lee | Paddy Twomey | 1:48.90 |} ==See also== * Horse racing in Ireland * List of Irish flat horse races ==References== *Racing Post: **, , , , , , , , , **, , , , , , , Category:Flat races in Ireland Category:Curragh Racecourse Category:Flat horse races for two-year-old fillies Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Ireland
